summary:
The Xbox 360 is a video game console made by Microsoft. It was released in 2005 as the follow-up to the original Xbox. With its online service, Xbox Live, players can game online, download games and media, and access various apps. The console competed with Sony's PlayStation 3 and Nintendo's Wii.

Despite initial supply shortages and hardware issues, the Xbox 360 became the best-selling American console. It was succeeded by the Xbox One in 2013, but production ended in 2016. Microsoft will stop selling games for the 360 in 2024, but existing games will still work.
title: Xbox 360
